minions.name: Megalodon
minions.description: You may destroy a minion of power 4 or less here. Special: Before this base scores, you may destroy a minion here of power 3 or less

minions.name: Great White
minions.description: Talent: Move this minion to another base and destroy a minion there of power 2 or less

minions.name: Hammerhead
minions.description: Ongoing: After a minion here is destroyed, place a +1 power counter on this minion

minions.name: Mako
minions.description: Special: After you destroy a minion on any base, you may play this minion there as an extra minion

actions.name: Blood in the Water
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: After a minion is destroyed here, you may play a minion here of power 3 or less as an extra minion

actions.name: Week of Sharks
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: If you have a minion here, draw an extra card at the end of your turn. Only use one Week of Sharks ability each turn

actions.name: Air Jaws
actions.description: Move one of your minions to another base, then destroy a minion there of power 3 or less

actions.name: Chum
actions.description: Play on a minion. Ongoing: After a minion is destroyed, place a +1 power counter on this minion

actions.name: Dangerous Waters
actions.description: Play on a base. Talent: Choose a minion here. It gets -2 power until the end of the turn

actions.name: Feeding Frenzy
actions.description: Choose a base. Destroy any number of minions there of power 2 or less

actions.name: Freakin' Laser Beam
actions.description: Choose one of your minions. Destroy a minion with equal or lower power at your minion's base

actions.name: Torn Apart
actions.description: Destroy a minion of power 3 or less and draw a card
